meanings.sent1: The cake was nifty, everyone loved it.
meanings.sent2: She received a nifty gift for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The nifty surprise party made her day.
meanings.sent4: His nifty skills in painting impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nifty sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.
